OP01-109_p1.Effect: [DON!! x1] [Your Turn] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, this Character gains +2000 power.

OP01-111.Name: Black Maria
OP01-111.Effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On Block] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): This Character gains +1000 power during this turn.

OP01-112.Name: Page One
OP01-112.Effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): This Character can also attack your opponent's active Characters during this turn.

OP01-113.Name: Holedem
OP01-113.Effect: [On K.O.] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

OP01-114.Name: X.Drake
OP01-114.Effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Your opponent trashes 1 card from their hand.

OP01-115.Name: Elephant's Marchoo
OP01-115.Effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less, then add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

OP01-116.Name: Artificial Devil Fruit SMILE
OP01-116.Effect: [Main] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; play up to 1 {SMILE} type Character card with a cost of 3 or less. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP01-117.Name: Sheep's Horn
OP01-117.Effect: [Main] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less.

OP01-118.Name: Ulti-Mortar
OP01-118.Effect: [Counter] DON!! −2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, draw 1 card.

OP01-119.Name: Thunder Bagua
OP01-119.Effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 2 or less Life cards, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

OP01-120.Name: Shanks
OP01-120.Effect:
[Rush] (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)
[When Attacking] Your opponent cannot activate a [Blocker] Character that has 2000 or less power during this battle.
